title: Generate Thumbnail
cap_description: Generate a thumbnail image preview of the document

required.name: file_path
required.arg_description: Path to the document file to process

optional.name: width
optional.arg_description: Width of the thumbnail in pixels

optional.name: height
optional.arg_description: Height of the thumbnail in pixels

optional.name: output_file
optional.arg_description: Write thumbnail to specified file instead of stdout

optional.name: page
optional.arg_description: Page number to generate thumbnail from (1-based, default: 1)

output.output_description: PNG image data representing a thumbnail of the document
